Who I am & what do I offer

My name is Myriam and I’m maintaining the Moroccan tradition and culture in the art of preparing delicious food. Moroccan Cuisine is known internationally by its variety and unique quality and flavors. I make homemade baked goods, macaroons, cookies and traditional Moroccan food for all occasions. My cuisine is here to allow you to share this culinary experience and give you the opportunity to taste one of the greatest cuisines in the world.
